item.title: J1 International Student Guide
item.description: In many ways, getting the visa for my US internship was `harder than getting my internship, because there is no Blind 75 to help you get through bureaucracy. Though there is a lot of information online, it can feel scattered and hard to find. This is particularly true for non-Canadian citizens since we have an additional interview at the US Consulate. Thatâ€™s where this guide (hopefully) comes in. Before I begin, here are some excellent guides made by other UW students you may want to check out as well:
